tasks.task: Constructing a canvas dam for surface irrigation.
subtasks: Dig a ditch at the top of the field.
Build a canvas dam near the field.
Move the canvas dam to the desired location.
Use small aluminum pipes to siphon water from the ditch.
Open and close gates on aluminum or plastic pipes.
Distribute water to different parts of the field.

tasks.task: Traveling to various Wyoming rivers and watersheds.
subtasks: Visit the North Platte, Bighorn, Laramie, Wind River, and PopoSevier River areas.

tasks.task: Providing education on flooding irrigation methods.
subtasks: Offering explanations of traditional agricultural techniques.
Highlighting the low-tech nature of surface irrigation.

tasks.task: Constructing a canvas dam for surface irrigation.
Traveling to various Wyoming watershed regions for irrigation.
MAINTASK: Constructing a canvas dam for surface irrigation.
subtasks: Dig a ditch at the top of the field.
Build a canvas dam near the field.
Move the canvas dam to the desired location.
Use small aluminum pipes to siphon water from the ditch.
Open and close gates on aluminum or hard plastic pipes.
Distribute water to different parts of the field.
